Lde/ecspride/ArrayAccess2;->onCreate:(La: The method originates user personal data via `Landroid/telephony/TelephonyManager;->getDeviceId()Ljava/lang/String;` which retrieves the device ID. This data is stored in a String array and then passed to `Landroid/telephony/SmsManager;->sendTextMessage(Ljava/lang/String;...` for network transmission, constituting a sink. No further methods are required as the data reaches a sink.
